certifications.name: HIPAA Compliance
certifications.full_name: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act

display_recommendation.title: Display HIPAA Compliance Certification
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: HIPAA compliance is legally required for healthcare organizations handling protected health information (PHI). Displaying this certification builds immediate trust with patients and healthcare partners.

certifications.name: HITECH Act Compliance
certifications.full_name: Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health Act

display_recommendation.title: Display HITECH Act Compliance
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: HITECH enhances HIPAA requirements for electronic health records. Demonstrating compliance shows commitment to data security and modern healthcare standards.

display_recommendation.title: Display SOC 2 Type II Certification
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: SOC 2 Type II demonstrates rigorous security, availability, and confidentiality controls audited over time. Essential for healthcare technology vendors and service providers.

display_recommendation.title: Display ISO 27001 Certification
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: ISO 27001 is the international standard for information security management. Shows systematic approach to protecting sensitive healthcare data.

display_recommendation.title: Display HL7/FHIR Compliance
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: HL7 standards enable healthcare data interoperability. FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) is becoming the modern standard for health data exchange.

certifications.name: FDA Registration
certifications.full_name: U.S. Food and Drug Administration Registration

display_recommendation.title: Display FDA Registration/Clearance
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: FDA registration demonstrates medical device compliance and regulatory approval, critical for patient safety and healthcare provider trust.

display_recommendation.title: Display HITRUST CSF Certification
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: HITRUST combines HIPAA, HITECH, and other healthcare security frameworks into one comprehensive standard. Highly valued by healthcare organizations.

display_recommendation.title: Display Joint Commission Accreditation
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: Joint Commission accreditation demonstrates commitment to quality and patient safety standards. Recognized gold standard for healthcare quality.

certifications.name: CCHIT Certification
certifications.full_name: Certification Commission for Health Information Technology

display_recommendation.title: Display CCHIT EHR Certification
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: CCHIT certification validates electronic health record (EHR) functionality, interoperability, and security standards.

display_recommendation.title: Display NCQA Accreditation
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: NCQA accreditation demonstrates quality healthcare measurement and improvement standards, particularly for health plans and managed care.

display_recommendation.title: Display ISO 13485 Certification
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: ISO 13485 demonstrates quality management systems for medical device design and manufacturing. Essential for medical device companies.

display_recommendation.title: Display URAC Accreditation
display_recommendation.why_it_matters: URAC accreditation demonstrates quality healthcare standards across various healthcare sectors including telehealth, pharmacy, and case management.
